serviceText: We have the expertise and experience needed to ensure you get your aircraft or ship registration, and skills needed to ensure ongoing compliance with various maritime and air transport regulators globally.

The need for asset management and investment advisory is becoming an integral part in the technological world today. Brokerage services such as buying or selling stock or bonds, or some combination of all these services need licensed asset/ investment advisers. Financial planning is an important criterion to investors globally.

Credit and Bond institutions are cooperative financial institutions specializing in the basic financial needs of certain groups of corporates. Institutions will need to be licensed to assist other corporates in criteria which depend on the target market.
Investment firms and brokerage institutions are nowadays obliged to fulfill publication and reporting requirements that are offered by Data Reporting Service Providers.
Money services businesses (MSBs) – a catch-all term used by financial regulators to describe the wide spectrum of businesses involved in converting or transmitting money
With the evolvement of digital assets and token, foundations have become a suitable entity. The simplicity of its formation and unique characteristics makes its flexible for different purposes.

Investment Vehicles and Funds provide a tried and tested way to manage and grow wealth. Camitrade Investment Fiduciaries is committed to providing a tailored service that will align with your financial plans and in a timely manner.
Camitrade Investment Fiduciaries is experienced in offshore company formations for all business entity types and industries.
Camitrade Investment is experienced in the local laws and in the setting up of offshore companies in by understanding your business objectives and structure.

Pension services provide end users with a safety cushion to ensure that und clients have comfort in Our days of retirement. Camitrade Investments Fiduciaries is well versed with the applicable laws needed to be adhered to in order to set up pension service companies in various jurisdictions.
